nodes.bodyText:
Two questions:

Is there a way to avoid this copy-paste across many files?
Will this work for spheroid dropships?

The loaders have a lot of repeated code. They really should be in a class hierarchy appropriate to the unit type rather than all inheriting directly from BlkFile. But that's way beyond the scope of this.
Yes. Rear side arcs are implemented as rear-mounted equipment on the wings.
